components

Class Castle

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.GameComponents
      • components.Castle

  • public class Castle
extends GameComponents
    This class defines the castle components for the game.
    Author:
    Team B

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Castle.CastleRank
      An enum to restrict the ranks of castles.

      private GameInstance.PlayerColor color

    • Constructor Detail

      • Castle

        public Castle()
        Default constructor.

      • Castle

        public Castle(GameInstance.PlayerColor c,
      Castle.CastleRank r)
        Create a castle with defined color and rank.
        Parameters:
        c - The color of the castle - the type of this parameter is the same type as enum PlayerColor in the model.GameInstance class.
        r - The rank of the castle.

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        public GameInstance.PlayerColor getColor()

      • setColor

        private void setColor(GameInstance.PlayerColor color)
        Sets the color of the castle. Note that the method is private. Once created castles can't change color - as this is not required as of build 1.
        Parameters:
        color - The color to set the castle to.

      • getRank

        public Castle.CastleRank getRank()

      • setRank

        private void setRank(Castle.CastleRank rank)
        Sets the rank of the castle to the value in the parameter. Note that the method is private - castle ranks can't be reset once they are created as this is not a requirement as of build 1.
        Parameters:
        rank - The rank to set the castle to.
